name: 3lock
description:
Hello ⭐ wanderer 💀 have ⏳ a ♦️ look 🀝 and 🔺 rest ⚛️ we ⏹️ have 🌀 time

Current developer highscore: 108

How to play :

Tiles go from the stack in the right corner through the board, following the grey center bar. There should always be at least one tile in the center bar. If not, it's game over.

Align three tiles with the same symbols to make a combo and generate more tiles. The more  combos you clear at the same time, the more tiles you will get. 

Make points by clearing the symbol shown in the mission in the left corner. Each mission cleared makes the current level go up. Level 1 gives 1 point, level 2 gives 2 points and so on. Each time you pass a level, a new symbol is unlocked. 

Each time a tile goes overboard, it's a skip. You can only skip 9 times per level or else you will go down one level.

Controls:

Touch or Mouse:

  • Swipe to the left anywhere : Move tiles on the center bar to the left
  • Press on a tile and swip : Move this tile

Keyboard:

  • Y/Z: Move tiles on the center bar to the left
  • Directional arrows: Move cursor
  • Directional arrows (When a tile is selected): Move selected tile
  • X (pressing): Select a tile where the cursor is
  • Q: Restart a game
  • Backspace: Cancel last move (if possible)
  • P: Open menu
